20110114030621.000|20110114030622.000|CC1|OUT YOUR TASKS DAY TO DAY UNDER

20110114030625.000|20110114030626.000|CC1|>> WELL, YOU HAVE TO UNDERSTAND 
20110114030626.000|20110114030628.000|CC1|THAT IN TERMS OF MEDICAL CARE,  
20110114030628.000|20110114030630.000|CC1|THIS IS WHAT WE DO ON A DAY TO  
20110114030630.000|20110114030632.000|CC1|DAY OR WEEK TO WEEK BASIS.      
20110114030632.000|20110114030633.000|CC1|WE CARE FOR VERY SICK PEOPLE.

20110114030635.000|20110114030636.000|CC1|WITH PATIENTS WITH DEVASTATING  
20110114030636.000|20110114030638.000|CC1|INJURIES, I NEVER WANT TO SAY   
20110114030638.000|20110114030642.000|CC1|THAT WE EVER BECOME IMMUNE TO   
20110114030642.000|20110114030644.000|CC1|THE PAIN AND THAT BEEVER GIVE UP
20110114030644.000|20110114030646.000|CC1|THAT SENSE OF COMPASSION, BUT WE
20110114030646.000|20110114030647.000|CC1|HAVE TO BE FUNCTIONAL, WHICH    
20110114030647.000|20110114030649.000|CC1|MEANS WE HAVE TO BE ABLE TO DEAL
20110114030649.000|20110114030650.000|CC1|WITH IT.                        
20110114030650.000|20110114030653.000|CC1|WE DEAL WITH IT IN OUR OWN WAYS.
20110114030653.000|20110114030655.000|CC1|AS FAR AS THE WHOLE MEDIA       
20110114030655.000|20110114030656.000|CC1|COMPONENT AND VARIOUS           
20110114030656.000|20110114030657.000|CC1|DIGNITARIES OF STATE, THAT'S

20110114030659.000|20110114030700.000|CC1|ME THAT PEOPLE WITH JOB         
20110114030700.000|20110114030702.000|CC1|DESCRIPTIONS THAT ARE WAY ABOVE

20110114030721.000|20110114030722.000|CC1|SHERIFF'S DEPARTMENT GOT A      
20110114030722.000|20110114030725.000|CC1|REPORT OF A BLACK DIAPER BAG    
20110114030725.000|20110114030728.000|CC1|FILLED WITH 9 MILLIMETER        
20110114030728.000|20110114030729.000|CC1|AMMUNITION DISCOVERED BY A MAN  
20110114030729.000|20110114030733.000|CC1|OUT WALKING HIS DOG IN ACCUSED  
20110114030733.000|20110114030734.000|CC1|JARED LOUGHNER'S NEIGHBORHOOD.  
20110114030734.000|20110114030735.000|CC1|AUTHORITIES BELIEVE IT'S THE    
20110114030735.000|20110114030737.000|CC1|SAME BAG THAT PROMPTEDED A      
20110114030737.000|20110114030739.000|CC1|CONFRONTATION BETWEEN JARED AND 
20110114030739.000|20110114030740.000|CC1|HIS FATHER IN THE HOURS BEFORE  
20110114030740.000|20110114030742.000|CC1|THE SHOOTING THAT SATURDAY.     
20110114030742.000|20110114030744.000|CC1|EARLIER THAT DAY JARED HAD GONE 
20110114030744.000|20110114030746.000|CC1|TO TWO DIFFERENT WALMARTS TO BUY
20110114030746.000|20110114030747.000|CC1|AMMUNITION AND THEN WAS PULLED  
20110114030747.000|20110114030749.000|CC1|OVER FOR RUNNING A RED LIGHT AND
20110114030749.000|20110114030750.000|CC1|RELEASED WITH A WARNING.        
20110114030750.000|20110114030751.000|CC1|WHEN HE RETURNED HOME, HE GOT   
20110114030751.000|20110114030753.000|CC1|INTO AN ARGUMENT WITH HIS       
20110114030753.000|20110114030754.000|CC1|FATHER, RANDY, WHO IS CHAED HIM 
20110114030754.000|20110114030756.000|CC1|INTO THE DESERT.                
20110114030756.000|20110114030758.000|CC1|JARED THEN TOOK A TAXI CAB TO   
20110114030758.000|20110114030802.000|CC1|THE SAFEWAY GROCERY STORE WHERE 
20110114030802.000|20110114030805.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GABBY GIFFORDS WAS
20110114030805.000|20110114030807.000|CC1|HOSTING HER EVENT.              
20110114030807.000|20110114030810.000|CC1|LOUGHNER'S AUNT SAYS JARED'S    
20110114030810.000|20110114030811.000|CC1|PARENTS ARE VICTIMS, TOO, GOING 
20110114030811.000|20110114030814.000|CC1|THROUGH AN UNBEARABLE           
20110114030814.000|20110114030815.000|CC1|PSYCHOLOGICAL TRAUMA NOW AS A   
20110114030815.000|20110114030818.000|CC1|RESULT OF THEIR SON'S ACTION.   
20110114030818.000|20110114030821.000|CC1|SHE SAYS HER NEPHEW IS MENTALLY 
20110114030821.000|20110114030822.000|CC1|ILL.                            
20110114030822.000|20110114030823.000|CC1|SO, COULD ANYTHING HAVE STOPPED 
20110114030823.000|20110114030825.000|CC1|THE TRAGIC CHAIN OF EVENTS THAT 
20110114030825.000|20110114030826.000|CC1|LED TO THE MASS SHOOTING ON     
20110114030826.000|20110114030828.000|CC1|SATURDAY?                       
20110114030828.000|20110114030831.000|CC1|HOW EASY DO WE WANT IT TO BE FOR
20110114030831.000|20110114030833.000|CC1|THE JARED LOUGHNERS OF THIS     
20110114030833.000|20110114030835.000|CC1|WORLD TO GET THEIR HANDS ON     
20110114030835.000|20110114030836.000|CC1|LOADED GUNS?

20110114033822.000|20110114033823.000|CC1|ACCUSATIONS IN NEW YORK, THE    
20110114033823.000|20110114033827.000|CC1|STATE I'M LIVING IN NOW, AND    
20110114033827.000|20110114033828.000|CC1|COUNTLESS NUMBER OF JEWS HAVE   
20110114033828.000|20110114033832.000|CC1|BEEN BURNED TO THE STAKE,       
20110114033832.000|20110114033834.000|CC1|TORTURED AND SKINNED, KILLED IN 
20110114033834.000|20110114033838.000|CC1|THE MOST BRUTAL WAY FOR THIS

20110114033839.000|20110114033840.000|CC1|ACCUSATION AGAINST JEWS.        
20110114033840.000|20110114033842.000|CC1|IN THE ARAB WORLD, THEY USE THAT
20110114033842.000|20110114033847.000|CC1|IN THEIR MEDIA TO LARGELY       
20110114033847.000|20110114033851.000|CC1|FERMENT ANTI-SEMITISM AND       
20110114033851.000|20110114033851.000|CC1|HATRED.                         
20110114033851.000|20110114033852.000|CC1|>> IF I RECALL THE CASE IN NEW
